mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date) VALUES(seq_product_prod_no.nextval, #{prodName}, #{prodDetail:VARCHAR}, REPLACE(#{manuDate:VARCHAR}, '/', ''), #{price:INTEGER}, #{fileName:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date FROM product WHERE prod_no = #{value}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM(SELECT prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, price, reg_date, image_file, (SELECT t.tran_status_code FROM transaction t WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no) AS proTranCode FROM product p
prod_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
price LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY
prod_no
price DESC
price ASC
)inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT prod_name FROM product WHERE UPPER(prod_name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{value}) || '%' ORDER BY prod_no

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, price, reg_date, image_file FROM product
prod_name LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
price LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
) countTable
